reviews.text: It is not as it seems and like others do it so well. There is a scandalous and not polite service, the staff leaves something to be desired. The view is very nice but not local. As for the menu, the drinks are not classic and are for prices that do not deserve. I suggest you not to be deceived by the appearance.ðŸ¤¢ðŸ˜•ðŸ¤¢

the manager or the owner does not know who it was. he was very arrogant and not polite at all. Someone needs to take him away as he is aggressive, my little girl, walking into the room, had a little meltdown in the hallway. The manager did not stop shouting at her and the child suffered a shock. We left and very upset. We will never return. I do not recommend my fate with that negative, very inhumane person to anyone.deserves no appreciation at all.

A good hotel, centrally located and a good price. Staff really helpful and friendly with good English. Only issues could be room was a bit on the dark side (great at night), and it was noisy due to location. Still a good place to stay at good rates.
Nice view of the city and the Grand mosque. Up on 4th floor is the bar cafe. Drink is good & service is good. Now it's summer the inside was still hot when I went recently.

The 5 star is for the amazing staff of the hotel. I am not very sure if itâ€™s really a 4 star hotel as there are no facilities available. If you stay in a single room, beware the bed is so small that you might fall off. The wifi mostly doesnâ€™t work. Bcoz of the location, the rooms are noisy as the glass is not soundproof. However, everything can be ignored by the amazing team who are always ready to help. Special thanks to reception team esp. Serena for being so helpful, kind, the breakfast lady & HK team. I would say I liked my stay only for the staff.
